LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Account_Contract_Template__c.description: Reference to the contract template with which the tactic template record is related. Mandatory for the tactic template record type.

cgcloud__Active_Policy__c.description: Specifies whether a contract tactic of this type is initially preset as included in the contract (not considered if the contract tactic is manually added to the promotion).

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Determines whether the template is active. Only active templates can be used for creating customer contracts.

cgcloud__Automatic_Creation__c.description: Describes whether the customer contract created that's approved with this template leverages the creation of a contract payment.

cgcloud__Copy_Tactics__c.description: Describes whether the tactics that are created after this tactic template are to be included in the copy of the contract.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Reference to the description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Job_Definition_List__c.description: Reference to the job definition list.

cgcloud__Max_Days__c.description: Maximum duration of the contract in days.

cgcloud__Meta_Type__c.description: Metatype for the integration with the mobile device.

cgcloud__Min_Days__c.description: Minimum duration of the contract in days.

cgcloud__Preset__c.description: Describes whether the Tactic Template is to be preset when creating the contract. If this checkbox is deselected, Tactics are available to manually add after creation.

cgcloud__Product_Policy__c.description: Describes the cardinality of the products that are related to the contracts based on this template.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the contract template belongs.

cgcloud__Workflow__c.description: Reference to the Workflow. Mandatory for the contract template record type.
